data.title: Cardano (ADA) Reclaims $2 For The First Time Since May Crash As Crypto Market Cap Nears $2 Trillion
data.text: What Happened: Crypto markets looked to be on the road to recovery, with the overall market cap of the industry nearing $2 trillion for the first time since the crash in May.

data.title: Kryptoin Files for Ethereum ETF With SEC
data.text: Delaware-based Kryptoin Investment Advisors has filed for an Ethereum exchange-traded fund with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission on Aug 12. The post Kryptoin Files for Ethereum ETF With SEC appeared first on BeInCrypto.

data.title: Cardano on Its Way to $5? Crypto Strategist Michaël Van De Poppe Analyzes the Path Forward for ADA
data.text: Popular crypto strategist Michaël van de Poppe is analyzing the path of Cardano (ADA) as traders await the Alonzo update that will bring smart contracts capability to the blockchain. In a new video, van de Poppe says ADA is breaking out of key resistance levels as it moves upwards. “Cardano is breaking through resistance, and […] The post Cardano on Its Way to $5?
